meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to one billionth of a gram.
meanings.sent1: A submicrogram of salt is too tiny to see with the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the medication in submicrograms to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled a submicrogram of sugar in my coffee, making it extra sweet.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of astronomy was just a submicrogram compared to his vast understanding.
meanings.sent5: The submicrogram of dust on the bookshelf sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Less than one millionth of a gram.
meanings.sent1: The lab required submicrogram amounts of the rare element for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The delicate balance required only a submicrogram of pressure to maintain.
meanings.sent3: The submicrogram kitten tried to pounce on a butterfly but missed by a mile.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was so soft, it was like a submicrogram of sound in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The submicrogram amount of rain barely wet the sidewalk.
